column4: for some reason when i play flash movies on my 64 bit 8.10 system, they ... stall all the time? they start playing, then just stop, i have to manually forward a bit, then it plays for a few seconds again and stops...
have you tried with flash10 64 bits ?
is it in the repo? i thought it was beta?
I believe there is a verion on the partner repository, you will need to enable it on the software sources
